title: Polki Kundan Jhumka - Delicate Floral Drop Earrings
materials: Emerald Beads. Features authentic Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: These elegant jhumkas feature a floral motif crafted with uncut Polki diamonds set in the traditional Kundan style. The design culminates in a delicate jhumka bell adorned with vibrant emerald beads, lending a touch of regal charm. The gold showcases meticulous detailing, reflecting the artistry of our skilled craftsmen.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
and traditional ceremonies such as Seemantham or Voni Function. Also suitable for adding a touch of ethnic elegance to modern celebrations.
description: These earrings seamlessly blend traditional South Indian craftsmanship with timeless design. The use of Polki diamonds and emeralds adds a touch of luxury, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine. These jhumkas are a symbol of heritage and sophistication, making them a treasured addition to any jewelry collection.
